Hospice of the Piedmont provides assistance to families at a difficult time and makes the inevitable the best it can be.  I work with a wonderful and caring team.
cons: Sorry to be a Pollyanna, but can't think of any.  Oh maybe the stress of the kind of work done here, but there are many support routes available for those that need it and I find management always ready to listen.
